languages.text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость. Мне стоило доложить об этом раньше, да только случая все никак не представлялось. Печать, что ищет госпожа Хейдари, была утеряна более четверти века назад. Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус выписала из Империума новую сразу после кражи, однако... сами понимаете — путь со священной Терры неблизкий. Да и варп-шторма бушуют в Просторе. По сей день нам так и не удалось получить замену".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Ваша Светлость. Мне стоило доложить об этом раньше, да только случая все никак не представлялось. Печать, что ищет госпожа Хейдари, была утеряна более четверти века назад. Ее светлость Теодора фон Валанциус выписала из Империума новую сразу после кражи, однако... сами понимаете — путь со священной Терры неблизкий. Да и варп-шторма бушуют в Просторе. По сей день нам так и не удалось получить замену".

languages.text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner. J'aurais dû vous en parler plus tôt, mais je n'ai jamais trouvé le bon moment pour le faire. Le sceau que maîtresse Heydari cherche a été perdu il y a plus de vingt-cinq ans. Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius en a commandé un nouveau à l'Imperium, mais... comme vous le savez, nous sommes bien loin de la Sainte Terra et, avec les tempêtes Warp qui ravagent les Étendues de Koronus, nous n'avons toujours pas reçu de chevalière de remplacement. »
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner. J'aurais dû vous en parler plus tôt, mais je n'ai jamais trouvé le bon moment pour le faire. Le sceau que maîtresse Heydari cherche a été perdu il y a plus de vingt-cinq ans. Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius en a commandé un nouveau à l'Imperium, mais... comme vous le savez, nous sommes bien loin de Sainte Terra et, avec les tempêtes Warp qui ravagent les Étendues de Koronus, nous n'avons toujours pas reçu de chevalière de remplacement. »

languages.text: “我请求您的原谅，大人。我本该早点报告才对，但一直都没有找到合适的时机。海达利女士要找的印章，早在二十五年前就遗失了。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人曾下令让帝国境内送来新的印章，但是……正如您所知，我们离神圣泰拉太远了，再加上亚空间风暴在科罗努斯扩区不断肆虐，我们至今都没有收到新的印章。”
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: “我请求您的原谅，大人。我本该早点报告才对，但一直都没有找到合适的时机。海达利女士要找的印章，早在二十五年前就遗失了。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人曾下令让帝国境内送来新的印章，但是……正如您所知，我们离神圣泰拉太远了，再加上亚空间风暴在科罗努斯扩区不断肆虐，我们至今都没有收到新的印章。”

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich hätte es früher melden sollen, doch es gab nie eine gute Gelegenheit. Das Siegel, nach dem Herrin Heydari sucht, ist vor über einem Vierteljahrhundert verloren gegangen. Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius hat ein neues vom Imperium angefordert, doch ... wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, sind wir sehr vom Heiligen Terra entfernt. Und da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von Warpstürmen heimgesucht wird, haben wir bis heute keinen Ersatz erhalten."
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich hätte es früher melden sollen, doch es gab nie eine gute Gelegenheit. Das Siegel, nach dem Herrin Heydari sucht, ist vor über einem Vierteljahrhundert verloren gegangen. Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius hat ein neues vom Imperium angefordert, doch ... wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, sind wir sehr vom Heiligen Terra entfernt. Und da die Koronus-Ausdehnung von Warpstürmen heimgesucht wird, haben wir bis heute keinen Ersatz erhalten."

languages.text: «Le pido perdón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Debería haberl{mf|o|a} informado antes, pero no encontraba el momento idóneo. El sello que la señora Heydari busca se perdió hace un cuarto de siglo. Su señoría Theodora von Valancius ordenó que el Imperium le entregase otro, pero... como ya sabe, estamos muy lejos de la Sagrada Terra. Y con las tormentas de disformidad que asolan la Extensión de Koronus, no hemos podido recibir aún un reemplazo».
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: «Le pido perdón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Debería haberl{mf|o|a} informado antes, pero no encontraba el momento idóneo. El sello que la señora Heydari busca se perdió hace un cuarto de siglo. Su señoría Theodora von Valancius ordenó que el Imperium le entregase otro, pero... como ya sabe, estamos muy lejos de la Sagrada Terra. Y con las tormentas disformes que asolan la Extensión de Koronus, no hemos podido recibir aún un reemplazo».

languages.text: 「陛下、どうかお許しください。この件について、もっと早く報告するべきでしたが、良いタイミングがありませんでした。ヘイダリ女史が探している印章は、、約四半世紀も前に失われました。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が帝国から新しいものを取り寄せるよう命じましたが…ご存知の通り、私たちは聖なる地球から遠く離れています。そして、コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒らす歪みの嵐のため、今日まで代替品を受け取ることができませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、どうかお許しください。この件について、もっと早く報告するべきでしたが、良いタイミングがありませんでした。ヘイダリ女史が探している印章は、、約四半世紀も前に失われました。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下が帝国から新しいものを取り寄せるよう命じましたが…ご存知の通り、私たちは聖なる地球から遠く離れています。そして、コロヌス・エクスパンスを荒らす歪みの嵐のため、今日まで代替品を受け取ることができませんでした」

languages.text: "Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu daha evvel bildirmeliydim ama hiç fırsat olmadı. Üstat Heydari'nin aradığı mühür, yirmi beş yılı aşkın bir süredir kayıp. Leydi Theodora von Valancius Hazretleri, İmparatorluk'tan yeni bir mühür gönderilmesini emretmişti de... Bildiğiniz üzere Kutsal Terra'dan epey uzaktayız. Koronus Enginliği'ne musallat olan öteboyut fırtınaları yüzünden de henüz eskisinin yerine yeni bir mühür temin edemedik."
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I should have reported this earlier, but there was never a good time. The seal Mistress Heydari is looking for was lost over a quarter of a century ago. Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered a new one to be delivered from the Imperium, but... as you well know, we are a long way away from Holy Terra. And with warp storms ravaging the Koronus Expanse, we have been unable to receive a replacement to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu daha evvel bildirmeliydim ama hiç fırsat olmadı ki. Üstat Heydari'nin aradığı mühür, yirmi beş yılı aşkın bir süredir kayıp. Leydi Hazretleri Theodora von Valancius, İmparatorluk'tan yeni bir mühür gönderilmesini emretmişti de... Bildiğiniz üzere Kutsal Terra'dan epey uzaktayız. Koronus Enginliği'ne musallat olan öteboyut fırtınaları yüzünden de henüz eskisinin yerine yeni bir mühür temin edemedik."
